column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////What I did NOT like: while this is a tapas restaurant
column2: I felt the small plates weren't easily shareable. For example
column3: we ordered the garlic scallops and
column5: we had to cut each scallop in half to have enough to go around. Also
column6: the chicken empanada (which I did not eat)
column7: was literally one medium sized empanada which you also had to cut into sections in order to share. The pixto platter was annoying as well because everything was bite sized! So
column8: if you happened to want that goat cheese croquetta (as I did)
column9: but some other member of your party who could not take a hint
column11: we basically had to cut it in two. It was wholly aggravating but whatever. I got over and enjoyed my meal anyway.
